CustomField.formula:
TEXT(FLOOR((Adverse_Action_Date__c-Protected_Activity_Date__c)/365.2425)) & " year(s)"&", " &
TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Adverse_Action_Date__c-Protected_Activity_Date__c),365.2425)/30)) & " month(s)"&", "&
TEXT(Floor(MOD(Floor(MOD((Adverse_Action_Date__c-Protected_Activity_Date__c),365.2425)),30))) & " day(s)"&"; total of "&
TEXT(Adverse_Action_Date__c - Protected_Activity_Date__c)&" day(s)"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates Adverse Action Date minus Protected Activity Date
CustomField.label: Temporal Proximity
